Elliot.line: Could you tell me more about your family, Ms. Niedenberg?

Liz.line: I can, yes. The Niedenberg family dates back to 1274, when the fief of Windberg bestowed their lands to the stewards of Niedenberg. Since then, we've maintained our position in austrian society.

Elliot.line: I see... So your wealth comes mostly from lands?

Liz.line: Well, y-yes, mostly. Part of our income also comes from noble dog breeds.

Elliot.line: Noble dog breeds? That's comparable to land wealth?

Narrator.line: Liz goes silent for a few moments. Her expression darkens.
